title: n173 Old Judge Cabinet, Hallman, PSA 3--Price Cut
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: n173 Old Judge Cabinet, Hallman, PSA 3--Price Cut
posts.post_content: Really nice one with unusually great centering and image--and far as I can see (could be wrong) the only one ever graded by PSA or SGC.  PSA calls it n172 but obviously n173 for sure and accepted as such.  Cutting another $50 to make this $1749  pp gift o check, plus $8 mailing, but that's as low as she'll go.  Thanks. [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=291458&stc=1&d=1508295280[/url]

Greg,

Very nice card.  I was following it in the Goodwin auction last month.  Beautiful.
bump for another, and final, price cut.
okay, one more price cut, this time for sure the last...
